description.en:
Al Khayma Resort offers luxury beachfront accommodations on a private beach in Sharm El Sheikh. Experience world-class Italian dining, premium spa services, and unforgettable Red Sea adventures. Perfect for romantic getaways, family vacations, and destination weddings.

faqs.question: Do you have a private beach?
faqs.answer: Yes! Al Khayma Resort features an exclusive private beach with pristine white sand and crystal-clear Red Sea waters, available exclusively to our guests.

faqs.question: What type of cuisine do you serve?
faqs.answer: Our signature restaurant specializes in authentic Italian cuisine, featuring fresh seafood, homemade pasta, and wood-fired pizzas. We also offer international dishes and can accommodate dietary restrictions.

faqs.question: Do you offer diving and water sports?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! We have a PADI-certified diving center, snorkeling equipment, kayaks, paddleboards, and various water sports. The Red Sea's famous coral reefs are just minutes away.

faqs.question: Is the resort family-friendly?
faqs.answer: Yes! We welcome families and offer a kids club, family rooms, children's pool, and special activities for young guests.

faqs.question: Can you host weddings and events?
faqs.answer: Yes! We specialize in beach weddings, corporate events, and private celebrations. Our event team will help you create an unforgettable experience.

faqs.question: How far is the resort from Sharm El Sheikh Airport?
faqs.answer: We're approximately 15 minutes from Sharm El Sheikh International Airport. We offer complimentary airport shuttle service for our guests.

faqs.question: What's included in the room rate?
faqs.answer: Room rates include WiFi, parking, beach access, pool access, and daily housekeeping. We also offer all-inclusive packages with meals and activities.

faqs.question: Do you have spa services?
faqs.answer: Yes! Our luxury spa offers massage therapy, facial treatments, body wraps, sauna, steam room, and wellness programs.

responseTemplate.positive: Thank you for your wonderful review! We're thrilled you enjoyed your stay at Al Khayma Resort. We look forward to welcoming you back soon! ğŸŒŠâœ¨
responseTemplate.negative: Thank you for your feedback. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience. Please contact us directly so we can make this right. Your satisfaction is our priority.

competitors: Four Seasons Resort Sharm El Sheikh
